{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Altice Labs |model=GR240BG |series=AC3200 |fcc_date=10/28/2017 |manuf_country=Portugal |is_manuf=No |type=wireless router, fiber gateway, ONT |fcc_id=2ACJF-FGW-GR240BG |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM68380 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX30LF1G08AA-TI |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4B2G1646F-BCMA |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4366E |wi1_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=4 |wi1_rxchains=4 |wi1_sstreams=4 |wi2_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi2_chip1_model=BCM4366E |wi2_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=4 |wi2_rxchains=4 |wi2_sstreams=4 |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=4 |flags=GPON, VoIP, TR-069, NitroQAM, block diagram, schematics, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=MyAltice XXXXXX |oui=00:06:91 }}
:• '''2166''' Mbps - 4SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan., 1024QAM), :• '''1000''' Mbps - 4SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 1024QAM) = '''''3200 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|Fiber Gateway}} :[http://www.alticelabs.com/en/286-altice-labs-developed-a-new-fiber-gateway-4x4.html Product page] "altice labs PCB1410 V3 2017-06-30" is silkscreened on the top of the board :and "PCB1410-V3 1700206546" is etched on the underside of the board.
